programme.title: Hard Hit [English Dub]
programme.desc: On his way to work, a bank manager receives an anonymous call claiming there's a bomb under his car seat, and if anyone exits the car, it will explode unless he can pay a ransom.

programme.title: The Terror Live [English Dub]
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: POLICE STORY: LOCKDOWN [English Dub]
programme.desc: A man looking for the release of a long-time prisoner takes a police officer, his daughter, and a group of strangers hostage.

programme.title: THE GREAT WAR OF ARCHIMEDES [English Dub]
programme.desc: It is the early 1930s and the command of the Japanese Imperial Navy determines to construct the world's biggest and most formidable battleship, Yamato. One of the admirals, Yamamoto Isoroku, disagrees. He recruits the upstart and mathematics' expert Tadashi Kai who discovers there are discrepancies between the official cost estimates and the actual figures. They soon find out that they have stumbled upon a conspiracy.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting [English Dub]
programme.desc: During transport, a group of hardened criminals stages a jailbreak that quickly escalates into a bloody, all-out riot.

programme.title: The Thieves [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Master thieves target a casino's $20M diamond, facing vaults, cops, and betrayals for the ultimate score.

programme.title: The Suspect [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Dong-chul seeks truth after family's murder. Framed for boss's death, he'll start a war for answers.

programme.title: Seobok: Project Clone [English Dub]
programme.desc: Ex-agent guards the first human clone against enemies, facing a dire decision.

programme.title: Road to Boston [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Jang Yun Jung and Do Kyung Wan are on a mission to find new singing talents! The show invites gifted vocalists who have not yet made their mark in the industry to a lesson with Jang. She teaches them the basics and corrects any bad habits they may have. Experience the magic of Dr. Jang, the empress of trot.

programme.desc: On his way to work, a bank manager receives an anonymous call claiming there's a bomb under his car seat, and if anyone exits the car, it will explode unless he can pay a ransom.
